english: bill [of money, e.g., a thousand-yen bill]

kanji: 空港 （ひこうじょう、飛行場）
朝鮮語、かんこくご、韓国語

english: this direction, thing, person, or place
that direction, thing, person, or place
that direction, thing, person, or place over there
which direction, thing, person, or place
to raise or extend one's hands
to be disturbed, to become confused
to grow cold, to get chilly, to cool down
to wake, to become sober, to be disillusioned
to harden, to solidify, to become firm
to be filled, to be surrounded, to overflow
to be buried, to be covered
to celebrate, to be jubilant, to have joy, to have delight, to have rapture
to console, to consolate, to provide empathy
to be disinterested, to be bored, to be tired of, to be weary
to be astonished, to be surprised, to be scared
to exchange, to substitute, to replace
to rest, to take a break, to go to bed
to split intoin, to be divided
to partin, to separatein, to break upin
things like <list of things>, including, such things as
